Requests for Quotes, and Requests for Information.• Support vendor proposal evaluation efforts and assist in documenting evaluation results.• Support process improvement initiatives• Assist market meetings, especially those related to requirements gathering and UAT.• Support project manager in maintaining project artifacts and developing status reports.• Support the development of surveys,
